text:
Hey everyone :wave:
Recently we, at our family studio Kohorta, have been working on the HubSpot app called LinkFetcher. It helps to speed up the transition from page to page making the website navigation feel instant. Appreciate you giving it a try. Super simple to install. Check it out here <https://linkfetcher.kohorta.co/>

If you have any questions, I’m here to answer :slightly_smiling_face:
